item.title: No-JS Collapsibles
item.description: I looked for how to make collapsibles without JavaScript some time ago to no avail, but figured it out after learning the parent:hover child CSS selector syntax. Check it out. The CSS is a little messy, mostly because I’m making three separate dropdowns with different behaviors. It’d be cleaner in most practical applications. The only gotchas I encountered were needing to specify the background color for the menus, and using white-space: nowrap on the horizontally opening menu so that the height is constant while animating.
